title: Soaking Tub, Access to RTC, Private Patio
posting_body: ['Allanza at The Lakes', 'Experience a lifestyle of luxury and comfort waiting for you at Allanza at the Lakes.', 'Conveniently located in the Summerlin Lakes Master Planned Community, Allanza at the Lakes has a mountain backdrop while only being a few miles from the excitement of the city.', 'Restaurants and shopping are just a short distance away at Boca Park.', 'With easy access to public transportation and the I-215, were minutes from downtown and the Strip.', 'Allanza at the Lakes is proudly certified under the Las Vegas Crime-Free Multi-Housing program!', 'If you are looking for comfortable apartment living near Summerlin, Nevada, Allanza at the Lakes is the community for you.', '-Luxurious Pools & Spas', '-Washer/Dryer Hookup', '-Easy Access to Shopping', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Picnic', 'Areas with Barbecues', '-Part-time Courtesy Patrol', '-Access to RTC', '-Package Lockers', '-Assigned Parking', '-Play area', '-State of the Art Fitness Centers', '-Pet Friendly', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
